Name: WAIFU HORROR: The Eight Pictures
About the game: WAIFU HORROR: The Eight Pictures Is a short first-person survival horror game. Your goal is to find eight pictures of anime girls and do not get caught by the Hentai Monster. You've left alone. No one around. No one to come for help. Test yourself in this ultimately horrific battle with the Hentai Monster and find out how far are you willing to go for your prize.. /
